description: This file defines a CMake function 'GetExternalCode' that automates the process of retrieving source code from a Git repository during the build configuration. It handles cloning, optional checkout to a specific version, and force cleanup of previous source directories.

methods.name: GetExternalCode
methods.description: A CMake function that clones a git repository at configuration time, optionally checking out a specific version and removing existing source directories if forced.
